definition: to have a power failure/power cut
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The typhoon is the cause of the electricity black-out .
sentences.chinese: 这个台风是造成停电的起因。

sentences.english: After the large and treacherous wind storm that hit New England a few weeks ago, I lost power.
sentences.chinese: 我家在险恶的强风暴袭击新英格兰后几周停电。

sentences.english: To prevent blackouts, factories are running their own diesel-powered generators.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止停电，一般工厂都运行有自己的柴油发电机。

sentences.english: By the way, why is there no electricity today?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一下，今儿怎么停电了啊？

sentences.english: Barometer readings are plotted on a pressure chart.
sentences.chinese: 高压输电线断落，造成大面积停电。
停电，水源枯竭，油价上窜。

sentences.english: Paraguay, which shares the dam with Brazil, also suffered a major blackout.
sentences.chinese: 与巴西共用大坝的巴拉圭也遭受了大停电。

sentences.english: When losing electrical power, upload car boards and drop the device manually .
sentences.chinese: 发生停电时，设有上载车板手动下降装置。

sentences.english: The tremor caused widespread blackouts in affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 该震动导致受灾地区大范围停电。

sentences.english: When the electricity went out, our whole street was black.
sentences.chinese: 一旦停电，整条大街变得黑黝黝的。

sentences.english: Which one is more terrible? Blackout or suspension of water supply?
sentences.chinese: 哪个更可怕，停电还是停水？

sentences.english: Winds have also disrupted electrical wires, cutting the electricity supply to one local community.
sentences.chinese: 大风还挂断了电线，造成了一个居民小区停电。

sentences.english: California has experienced many black-outs this year.
This is the third time in a week that the electricity supply has been cut off—it really is the limit.
sentences.chinese: 这已经是一个星期内第三次停电了，真叫人无法忍受。

sentences.english: The heat wave along with occasional power-cuts had made life miserable here.
sentences.chinese: 热浪外加偶尔停电，使得这里的生活相当痛苦。

sentences.english: Automatic lifting of the flasks during a power failure.
sentences.chinese: 突然停电，蒸发瓶会自动提升。

definition: (of a circuit breaker or switch) to trip
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
